name: ZombieRun
description: ZombieRun is a retro platformer with the aim to bring sexy back to local multiplayer gaming. It's you, your friends and guns against all the living dead roaming around. If that's not enough there are also apples, carrots and superpowers in play.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8 Processor: 1.5 Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 Compatible Storage: 40 MB available space

reviews.review_text: I GOT THIS AS A FREE KEY ON REDDIT~!  While the game is nice in terms of retro styling, the inability to change resolution is a huge drawback. There is no distinct warning for danger, and the controls are a little clunky. I really wanted this to be better than it was. I apologize to the developer for the bad review but I really can't endorse it.   You will probably notice that there is no almost no time played on my account for this game but that is just because i played in steam offline mode an a different computer because of the ridiculously absurd fact that you need to download java to run this game.   I gace it like an hour and a half to prove itself worthy but Sorry but this gets a thumbs down.
I got this in a bundle for a dime or two and I wish i had never wasted time playing it
